subject: Volleyball
lead_paragraph: The United States upset the five-time defending champion Brazil, 25-23, 25-22, 27-25, to advance to the World League volleyball final Sunday against Serbia in Rio de Janeiro. Clayton Stanley had three aces to lead the United States. Serbia advanced by beating Russia, 25-19, 25-19, 25-23.
